dict.string: Rhythm Flow tracks your workout data to help you reach your fitness goals.
Rhythm Flow saves your workout data to the Health app.
Rhythm Flow uses the local network for multiplayer features with SharePlay.
Rhythm Flow can use your microphone for voice commands during gameplay.
Rhythm Flow uses hand tracking to detect your movements and gestures for gameplay.
Rhythm Flow scans your play area to create a safe and immersive gaming environment.
